tools.logging

Class TestOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.logging.TestOutput

  • public class TestOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    Test Output A custom generated output file recording all actions taken

    1.0.4
    Author:
    Max Saperstone

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestOutput

        public TestOutput(java.lang.String testsName,
                  java.lang.String outputDir,
                  java.lang.String pageURL)
        the basic test output constructor, providing access to the output file and all page elements
        Parameters:
        testsName - - the name of the file we will write out all commands to
        outputDir - - the output directory to store the test results
        pageURL - - the initial URL to load up/log

      • TestOutput

        public TestOutput(java.lang.String testsName,
                  java.lang.String outputDir,
                  java.lang.String pageURL,
                  java.lang.String testsSuite,
                  java.lang.String testsGroup,
                  java.util.Date iDateModified,
                  java.lang.String iVersion,
                  java.lang.String iAuthor,
                  java.lang.String iTestObjectives)
        the complex test out constructor taking in all test document information
        Parameters:
        testsName - the name of the file we will write out to
        outputDir - the output directory to store the results
        pageURL - the initial URL to load up/log
        testsSuite - the suite of tests the test belongs to
        testsGroup - the group of tests the test belongs to
        iDateModified - the date the test was created
        iVersion - the version number of the test
        iAuthor - the author of the tests
        iTestObjectives - the test objectives

      • captureImage

        public java.lang.String captureImage(java.lang.String checkPerformed)
        generates a unique image name based on the action the time, and a unique random string, creates an image using that name, and returns a processed link to be included in an HTML file
        Parameters:
        checkPerformed - the check action being performed, the image will be tagged with this action
        Returns:
        a processed link to be included in an HTML file

                                          InvalidLocatorTypeException

        Parameters:
        type - - the locator type e.g. Locators.id, Locators.xpath
        locator - - the locator string e.g. login, //input[@id='login']
        unexpectedClass - - the unexpected class value
        Returns:
        Integer: 1 if a failure and 0 if a pass
        Throws:
        InvalidLocatorTypeException
        InvalidActionException
